title: Bug 48234org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.getLogger() not threadsafe?
description: Bug 48234org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.getLogger() not threadsafe? This seems wrong.org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.logger should probably be private to prevent unsynch. [Not sure if the method ever returns the parent logger either.]
OB: org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.getLogger() is not synchronised, yet all the other methods which access org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.logger are synch. access by subclasses.Similar considerations apply to logName and logName()The Javadoc for getLogger() states that it can return nullthat does not appear to be possible.
